name: Kahin Soccer Guess Program
short_description:
calculates approximate scores and winning chances of given teams.

To use, visit soccerway.com andresearch game statistics of giventeams. Insert the desirable values(home winning,away winningetc.) to program. 

This program gives you only statistical information about games.Please report bugs. 

twitter.com/kahinexe

*****

Takimlarin kazanma ihtimallerini vetahmini skorlari hesaplar. 

Kullanmak icin,soccerway.com'dan maci olan takimlari aratarak o sezon icindeki istatistiklerine ulasiniz. Sizden istenenverileri(ic saha galibiyet,yenilgi,goller vs.) giriniz.

Bu program sadece maclar hakkinda istatistiksel bilgi verir. Buldugunuz buglari bildiriniz.

twitter.com/kahinexe
summary: Gives statistical information about soccer games
